com.googlecode.aluminumproject.expressions.el

Class ElExpressionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.aluminumproject.expressions.el.ElExpressionFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationElement, ExpressionFactory

    public class ElExpressionFactory
extends Object
implements ExpressionFactory
    An expression factory that uses the Unified Expression Language to create expressions.

    Expression factories may be constructed with a number of implementation-specific properties. The properties to supply can be configured by providing a parameter named "expression_factory.el.expression_factory_properties"; by default, the expression factory is created without any parameters.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String EXPRESSION_FACTORY_PROPERTIES
      The name of the configuration parameter that contains a map of properties that the EL expression factory should be created with.

      Creates an EL expression factory.
